title: List of scientists in medieval Islamic world

paragraphs.text: This is a list of Muslim scientists who have contributed significantly to science and civilization in the Islamic Golden Age (i.e. from the 8th century to the 14th century).

paragraphs.title: Philosophers
paragraphs.text: For a detailed list of Muslim philosophers, refer to the List of Muslim philosophers, this list only includes philosophers who were active in the medieval Islamic world.
